downloadDescription: This is the trial for Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010 with Standard Client Access License features
detailsSection:
This is the trial for Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010.


SharePoint Server 2010 with Standard Client Access License features

For organizations looking to deploy a business collaboration platform across all types of content. Use the core capabilities of SharePoint to manage content and business processes, find and share information and expertise, and simplify how people work together across organizational boundaries.

The trial period is 180 days. You can convert to a licensed installation at any time during the trial or after the trial has expired by entering the appropriate product key.
systemRequirementsSection: Please review the SharePoint Server 2010 system requirements before you proceed. Actual requirements and product functionality may vary based on your system configuration.​
installInstructionSection:
To install this download:

Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010 Standard:

Download the file by clicking the Download button and save the file to your hard disk.
Refer to the following documentation for installation guidance:

Deployment guide
Known Issues/Readme
Upgrading to Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010
SharePoint 2010 Reviewer's Guide
Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010 Evaluation Guide for IT Professionals
Microsoft SharePoint 2010 Professional Developer's Evaluation Guide

Complete the installation by following the documentation.



To remove this download:


On the Start menu, point to Settings and then click Control Panel.
Double-click Add/Remove Programs.
In the list of currently installed programs, select Microsoft SharePoint Server 2010 Trial Version and then click Remove or Add/Remove. If a dialog box appears, follow the instructions to remove the program.
Click Yes or OK to confirm that you want to remove the program.

​
